content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, an ellipse is given by <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over 5 squared plus open parentheses y plus 5 close parentheses squared over 6 squared equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>. If <math alttext="open parentheses h comma k close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> is the center of the ellipse, which of the following is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="h equals 4"><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math> and <math alttext="k equals negative 5"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>
<math alttext="h equals negative 4"><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math> and <math alttext="k equals 5"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>

<math alttext="h equals 4 over 5"><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="k equals negative 5 over 6"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="h equals negative 4 over 5"><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="k equals 5 over 6"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="h equals 4"><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math> and <math alttext="k equals negative 5"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
